metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6342 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
elog 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to post data as any username in the logbook.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-6342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elog - 3.1.2-1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elog package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-1-1').
